Note: Participant says using the glasses outside is fine as long as they’re not in the sun because it “fades the glasses out”.
Participant states at current level of sunlight, she must look down towards the dashboard in order to see the reels. If she looks up towards the road she can’t see.
Participant states if she’s consistently looking at a phone when she’s a passenger in a car she feels a bit carsick. She has to look away out the window for a bit.
